mc.name: Sacred Mesa
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sacred Mesa unless you sacrifice a Pegasus.
{1}{W}: Put a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying into play.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sacred Mesa unless you sacrifice a Pegasus.
{1}{W}: Put a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying into play.
mc.flavorText:
"Do not go there, do not go / unless you rise on wings, unless you walk on hooves."
--"Song to the Sun," Femeref song

mc.name: Valor
mc.oracleText:
First strike
As long as Valor is in your graveyard and you control a Plains, creatures you control have first strike.
mc.printedText:
First strike
As long as Valor is in your graveyard and you control a Plains, creatures you control have first strike.
mc.flavorText:
"The cracks widened, the shell crumbled, and Valor spread throughout the land."
--Scroll of Beginnings

mc.name: Dandân
mc.oracleText:
Dandân can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Dandân.
mc.printedText:
Dandan can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Dandan.
mc.flavorText:
"Catch good today. Start replacing crew tomorrow."
--Faysal al-Mousa, fisher captain, log

mc.name: Disintegrate
mc.oracleText: Disintegrate deals X damage to target creature or player. That creature can't be regenerated this turn. If the creature would be put into a graveyard this turn, remove it from the game instead.
mc.printedText: Disintegrate deals X damage to target creature or player. That creature can't be regenerated this turn. If the creature would be put into a graveyard this turn, remove it from the game instead.

mc.name: Stormscape Familiar
mc.oracleText:
Flying
White spells and black spells you play cost {1} less to play.
mc.printedText:
Flying
White spells and black spells you play cost {1} less to play.
mc.flavorText: Each Stormscape apprentice must hand-raise and train an owl before attaining the rank of master.

mc.name: Sengir Autocrat
mc.oracleText:
When Sengir Autocrat comes into play, put three 0/1 black Serf creature tokens into play.
When Sengir Autocrat leaves play, remove all Serf tokens from the game.
mc.printedText:
When Sengir Autocrat comes into play, put three 0/1 black Serf creature tokens into play.
When Sengir Autocrat leaves play, remove all Serf tokens from the game.
mc.flavorText:
"A thankless job, and a death sentence besides."
--Eron the Relentless

mc.name: Celestial Dawn
mc.oracleText:
Lands you control are Plains.
Nonland cards you own that aren't in play, spells you control, and nonland permanents you control are white.
You may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color. You may spend other mana only as though it were colorless mana.
mc.printedText:
Lands you control are Plains.
Nonland cards you own that aren't in play, spells you control, and nonland permanents you control are white.
You may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color. You may spend other mana only as though it were colorless mana.

mc.name: Lord of Atlantis
mc.oracleText: Other Merfolk creatures get +1/+1 and have islandwalk.
mc.printedText: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk.
mc.flavorText: A master of tactics, the Lord of Atlantis makes his people bold in battle merely by arriving to lead them.

mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Soul Collector this turn is put into a graveyard, return that card to play under your control.

Whenever a creature dealt damage by Soul Collector this turn is put into a graveyard, return that card to play under your control.

mc.printedText: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black, protection from red

Trample
Orgg can't attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 3 or greater.
Orgg can't block creatures with power 3 or greater.
mc.printedText:
Trample
Orgg can't attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 3 or greater.
Orgg can't block creatures with power 3 or greater.
mc.flavorText: It's bigger than it thinks.

mc.name: Essence Sliver
mc.oracleText: All Slivers have lifelink. (Whenever a Sliver deals damage, its controller gain that much life.)
mc.printedText: Whenever a Sliver deals damage, its controller gains that much life.
mc.flavorText: The slivers would survive, even at the expense of every other creature on Otaria.

mc.name: Scragnoth
mc.oracleText:
Scragnoth can't be countered.
Protection from blue
mc.printedText:
Scragnoth can't be countered.
Protection from blue
mc.flavorText: It possesses no intelligence, only counter-intelligence.

mc.name: Whispers of the Muse
mc.oracleText:
Buyback {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you play this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Buyback {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you play this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"I followed her song only to find it was a dirge."
--Crovax

mc.name: Swamp Mosquito

Flying
Whenever Swamp Mosquito attacks and isn't blocked, defending player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Swamp Mosquito attacks and isn't blocked, defending player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

mc.name: Wall of Roots
mc.oracleText:
Defender
Put a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G} to your mana pool. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.printedText:
Defender
Put a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G} to your mana pool. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.flavorText: Sometimes the wise ones wove their magic into living plants; as the plant grew, so grew the magic.

mc.name: Kobold Taskmaster
mc.oracleText: Other Kobold creatures you control get +1/+0.
mc.printedText: Other Kobolds you control get +1/+0.
mc.flavorText: The taskmaster knows that there is no cure for the common kobold.

mc.printedText: Sacrifice an enchantment: Auratog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The auratog enjoys eating its wards.

mc.name: Safe Haven

{2}, {T}: Remove target creature you control from the game.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice Safe Haven. If you do, return each card removed from the game with Safe Haven to play under its owner's control.

{2}, {T}: Remove target creature you control from the game.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice Safe Haven. If you do, return each card removed from the game with Safe Haven to play under its owner's control.

mc.name: Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore

Non-Eye creatures you control can't attack.

mc.printedText:
Non-Eye creatures you control can't attack.
Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore can't be blocked except by Walls.

{T}: Goblin Snowman deals 1 damage to target creature it's blocking.
mc.printedText:

Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Dauthi Slayer attacks each turn if able.

Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

mc.name: Flying Men
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying

mc.name: Ghost Ship

Flying
{U}{U}{U}: Regenerate Ghost Ship.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{U}{U}{U}: Regenerate Ghost Ship.

mc.name: Hail Storm

mc.printedText: Hail Storm deals 2 damage to each attacking creature and 1 damage to you and each creature you control.

"If they can't take the hail, they'd better stay home."

mc.printedText: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to him or her. If no one does, target player draws three cards.

mc.printedText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

mc.printedText: {2}{G}, {T}, Discard two cards: Until end of turn, all lands target player controls are 3/3 creatures that are still lands.

Play with your hand revealed.

Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from play, return it to your hand.

Play with your hand revealed.
If you would draw a card, reveal the top card of your library instead. If it's a creature card, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, draw a card.

--Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

mc.name: Funeral Charm
mc.oracleText: Choose one - Target player discards a card; or target creature gets +2/-1 until end of turn; or target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Choose one Target player discards a card; or target creature gets +2/-1 until end of turn; or target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn.

mc.name: Prodigal Sorcerer
mc.oracleText: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: Occasionally, members of the Institute of Arcane Study acquire a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

mc.name: Squire
mc.flavorText:
"Of twenty yeer of age he was, I gesse.
Of his stature he was of evene lengthe.
And wonderly delyvere, and of greete strengthe."
--Geoffrey Chaucer,
The Canterbury Tales

mc.name: Cockatrice
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Cockatrice blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Cockatrice blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

mc.name: Conspiracy
mc.oracleText:
As Conspiracy comes into play, choose a creature type.
Creature cards you own that aren't in play, creature spells you control, and creatures you control are the chosen type.
mc.printedText:
As Conspiracy comes into play, choose a creature type.
Creature cards you own that aren't in play, creature spells you control, and creatures you control are the chosen type.

mc.name: Tribal Flames
mc.oracleText: Tribal Flames deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.
mc.printedText: Tribal Flames deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.
mc.flavorText:
"Fire is the universal language."
--Jhoira, master artificer

mc.name: Desolation Giant
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you play this spell.)
When Desolation Giant comes into play, destroy all other creatures you control. If the kicker cost was paid, destroy all other creatures instead.
mc.printedText:
Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you play this spell.)
When Desolation Giant comes into play, destroy all other creatures you control. If the kicker cost was paid, destroy all other creatures instead.

mc.name: Darkness
mc.oracleText: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
mc.printedText: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
mc.flavorText:
"If I must die, I will encounter darkness as a bride, / And hug it in mine arms."
--William Shakespeare,
Measure for Measure

mc.name: Leviathan
mc.oracleText:
Trample
Leviathan comes into play tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice two Islands. If you do, untap Leviathan.
Leviathan can't attack unless you sacrifice two Islands.
mc.printedText:
Trample
Leviathan comes into play tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice two Islands. If you do, untap Leviathan.
Leviathan can't attack unless you sacrifice two Islands.

mc.name: Eron the Relentless
mc.oracleText:
Haste
{R}{R}{R}: Regenerate Eron the Relentless.
mc.printedText:
Haste
{R}{R}{R}: Regenerate Eron the Relentless.
mc.flavorText:
"Eron would be much less of a hassle if only he were mortal."
--Reyhan, Samite alchemist

mc.name: Stupor
mc.oracleText: Target opponent discards a card at random, then discards a card.
mc.printedText: Target opponent discards a card at random, then discards a card.
mc.flavorText:
There are medicines for all afflictions but idleness.
--Suq'Ata saying

{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

Pirate Ship can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

When you control no Islands, sacrifice Pirate Ship.
mc.printedText:
Pirate Ship can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
{T}: Pirate Ship deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Pirate Ship.

mc.printedText: {T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it.

mc.name: Call of the Herd

Put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token into play.

mc.printedText:

mc.name: Stormbind

mc.printedText: {2}, Discard a card at random: Stormbind deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
"Once, our people could call down the storm itself to do our bidding."
--Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

mc.name: Void
mc.oracleText: Choose a number. Destroy all artifacts and creatures with converted mana cost equal to that number. Then target player reveals his or her hand and discards all nonland cards with converted mana cost equal to the number.
mc.printedText: Choose a number. Destroy all artifacts and creatures with converted mana cost equal to that number. Then target player reveals his or her hand and discards all nonland cards with converted mana cost equal to the number.

mc.name: Spined Sliver
mc.oracleText: Whenever a Sliver becomes blocked, that Sliver gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
mc.printedText: Whenever a Sliver becomes blocked, that Sliver gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
mc.flavorText:
"Slivers are evil and slivers are sly;
And if you get eaten, then no one will cry."
--Mogg children's rhyme

mc.name: Whirling Dervish
mc.oracleText:
Protection from black
At end of turn, if Whirling Dervish dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
mc.printedText:
Protection from black
At end of turn, if Whirling Dervish dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

mc.name: Krosan Cloudscraper

At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Krosan Cloudscraper unless you pay {G}{G}.

Morph {7}{G}{G} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

mc.name: Verdeloth the Ancient
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you play this spell.)
Other Treefolk creatures and Saproling creatures get +1/+1.
When Verdeloth the Ancient comes into play, if the kicker cost was paid, put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens into play.
mc.printedText:
Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you play this spell.)
All other Treefolk and all Saprolings get +1/+1.
When Verdeloth the Ancient comes into play, if the kicker cost was paid, put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens into play.

mc.name: Claws of Gix
mc.oracleText: {1}, Sacrifice a permanent: You gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: {1}, Sacrifice a permanent: You gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: When the Brotherhood of Gix dug out the cave of Koilos they found their master's severed hand. They enshrined it, hoping that one day it would point the way to Phyrexia.

mc.name: Mystic Snake
mc.oracleText:
Flash (You may play this spell any time you could play an instant.)
When Mystic Snake comes into play, counter target spell.
mc.printedText:
Flash (You may play this spell any time you could play an instant.)
When Mystic Snake comes into play, counter target spell.
mc.flavorText: Its fangs are in your flesh before its hiss leaves your ears.

mc.name: Feldon's Cane
mc.oracleText: {T}, Remove Feldon's Cane from the game: Shuffle your graveyard into your library.
mc.printedText: {T}, Remove Feldon's Cane from the game: Shuffle your graveyard into your library.
mc.flavorText: Feldon found the first of these canes frozen in the Ronom Glacier.

mc.name: Assault
mc.oracleText: Assault deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Assault deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Battery
mc.oracleText: Put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token into play.
mc.printedText: Put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token into play.

mc.name: Grinning Totem
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Grinning Totem: Search target opponent's library for a card and remove it from the game. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card. At the beginning of your next upkeep, if you haven't played it, put it into its owner's graveyard.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Grinning Totem: Search target opponent's library for a card and remove it from the game. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card. At the beginning of your next upkeep, if you haven't played it, put it into its owner's graveyard.

mc.name: Desert

{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

mc.name: Tormod's Crypt

mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Tormod's Crypt: Remove target player's graveyard from the game.
mc.flavorText: The dark opening seemed to breathe the cold, damp air of the dead earth in a steady rhythm.

mc.name: Coalition Victory
mc.oracleText: You win the game if you control a land of each basic land type and a creature of each color.
mc.printedText: You win the game if you control a land of each basic land type and a creature of each color.
mc.flavorText:
"You can build a perfect machine out of imperfect parts."
--Urza

mc.oracleText:
Swampwalk
Whenever a player plays a black spell, you gain 1 life.
mc.printedText:
Swampwalk
Whenever a player plays a black spell, you gain 1 life.

mc.name: Mirari
mc.oracleText: Whenever you play an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
mc.printedText: Whenever you play an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
mc.flavorText:
"It offers you what you want, not what you need."
--Braids, dementia summoner

mc.name: The Rack
mc.oracleText:
As The Rack comes into play, choose an opponent.
At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, The Rack deals X damage to that player, where X is 3 minus the number of cards in his or her hand.
mc.printedText:
As The Rack comes into play, choose an opponent.
At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, The Rack deals X damage to that player, where X is 3 minus the number of cards in his or her hand.
mc.flavorText: Invented in Mishra's earlier days, the rack was once his most feared creation.

mc.name: Serrated Arrows
mc.oracleText:
Serrated Arrows comes into play with three arrowhead counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no arrowhead counters on Serrated Arrows, sacrifice it.
{T}, Remove an arrowhead counter from Serrated Arrows: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

mc.name: Dodecapod

mc.printedText: If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Dodecapod, put it into play with two +1/+1 counters on it instead of putting it into your graveyard.

mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature you control and target creature of an opponent's choice he or she controls. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its power to the other.

mc.name: Gaea's Liege
mc.oracleText:
As long as Gaea's Liege isn't attacking, its power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control. As long as Gaea's Liege is attacking, its power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests defending player controls.
{T}: Target land becomes a Forest until Gaea's Liege leaves play.
mc.printedText:
Gaea's Liege's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control. As long as Gaea's Liege is attacking, its power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests defending player controls instead.
{T}: Target land becomes a Forest until Gaea's Liege leaves play.

Trample
Rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

Flying
